==> Battle Rage - The Robot Wars! -.direct.play.- <==

<->( about )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

In Battle Rage: The Robot Wars the player can compete with giant
robots against other opponents, which can be as many as 3, or a 
team can take on one single opponent. 
The robots can also be modified to fit in best with a certain players 
style.

<->( features )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

a hell of alot... 



<->( Hardware Requirements )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

Pc with Windows 9x/ME/NT/2000/XP(sp3)/Vista



<->( how to play )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

1.: Unrar with 7zip ONLY!.

2.: WinXP users double click: Battle-WinXP.exe  ( must be done )

2b: Vista...users double click: Battle-ViSTA.exe ( must be done )

3.: double click > makedestopicon.exe < and play game with.



<->( E X T R A S )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

extra files can be found in ToeD folder...


<->( Special Info )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

Some virus-scanner recognize the header of a packed .exe file , in this

case its the file > Battle-***.exe < as a lame virus, because its  

the byte by byte check error of some virustools!. ( h e u r i s t i c s  ) but... 

Its almost certainly a false positive alert from overly protective heuristics,

you can read more about in your VirusTool-Manual or VirusTools-WebSite!.

(heuristics).  if you dont believe that, then simple stay away, no need for

nonsense-comments.  once again... >>> dont trust = stay away <<<
